A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disappointment! Commercialised for Disney to sell silly 'cute' characters which were unnecessary through the film. The film focused on the wrong areas giving air time to less important bits and in turn only giving a few seconds to the bits we all came for. Too silly\, borderline slapstick comments \"chrome dome?!\" What an original Star Wars material.\n\nOverall it has been Marvelfied. Far too many super tight camera\, stupid in house jokes and a little too long.
